mapper.insert: INSERT INTO noticeBoard(num, tNum, userId, subject, content, regDate, hotCount) VALUES(noticeBoard_seq.NEXTVAL, #{tNum}, #{userId}, #{subject},#{content},SYSDATE,0)
mapper.select: SELECT b.num, b.tNum, b.userId, nickName, b.subject, b.hitCount, TO_CHAR(b.regDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') FROM noticeBoard b JOIN member m ON b.userId = m.userId
SELECT NVL(COUNt(*),0) FROM noticeBoard b JOIN member m ON b.userId = m.userId
mapper.update: UPDATE noticeBoard SET subject=#{subject}, content=#{content} WHERE num=#{num}
